PHRASE.LANG: Keep your trusty gun within reach with this concealed leg holster and mini-skirt. [#Legal]
Gardez votre arme à portée de main avec cet étui caché sous votre mini-jupe. [#Legal]
Mit diesem Beinhalfter und dem Minirock hast du deine zuverlässige Pistole immer zur Hand. [#Legal]
Tieni la tua fedele pistola a portata di mano con giarrettiera e minigonna perfette per un agente del tuo calibro. [#Legal]
Ten siempre a mano tu arma de confianza con este conjunto de pistolera para pierna y minifalda. [#Legal]
미니스커트 안에 은밀하게 숨긴 권총집으로 언제든 전투 태세를 유지하세요. [#Legal]
Keep your trusty gun within reach with this concealed leg holster and mini-skirt. [#Legal]
用這個不外露的腿部槍套收好你那把可靠的手槍。 [#Legal]
用這個不外露的腿部槍套收好你那把可靠的手槍。 [#Legal]
Keep your trusty gun within reach with this concealed leg holster and mini-skirt. [#Legal]
